articles.author: Ernest Scheyder, David Shepardson, Gabriel Araujo
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday issued a blitz of tariff announcements ranging from changes to previously threatened levies on imports of copper and on goods from Brazil to ending an exemption from tariffs for small-value shipments from overseas.
articles.title: Trump issues blitz of tariff announcements on copper, Brazil, small-value imports
